fields.Title of Presentation: "Money, Power, and Influence in Eighteenth-Century Lithuania: The Jews on the Radziwiłł Estates" by Adam Teller
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Association for Slavic East European and Eurasian Studies Annual Meeting
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Association for Slavic, East European, and Eurasian Studies
fields.Description/Abstract: Since 2015, the Polish Studies Association has been organizing a roundtable discussion of a new book that we consider groundbreaking or provocative. For 2018 we will feature Adam Teller's "Money, Power, and Influence in Eighteenth-Century Lithuania: The Jews on the Radziwiłł Estates." The book examines how Jews achieved an extraordinary success within the late feudal economy of the eighteenth-century Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth thanks to an identification and exploitation of economic niches in the pre-modern economy.
